app.name: InnerFriend
app.description: Ein datenschutzfreundliches Tool zur Pflege bedeutungsvoller Freundschaften basierend auf der Dunbar-Zahl-Forschung

landing.heroDescription: Nach Dunbars Forschung k√∂nnen wir nur etwa 5 enge Freundschaften, 15 gute Freunde und 150 bedeutsame Verbindungen wirklich pflegen. Inner Friend hilft dir dabei, die Beziehungen bewusst zu pflegen, die am wichtigsten sind.

intentionalLimits.title: Bewusste Grenzen
intentionalLimits.description: Die Wissenschaft zeigt, dass wir nat√ºrliche Grenzen f√ºr bedeutsame Beziehungen haben. Akzeptiere sie, um dich auf die zu konzentrieren, die wirklich wichtig sind.

privateByDefault.title: Standardm√§√üig privat

mutualDiscovery.title: Gegenseitige Entdeckung
mutualDiscovery.description: Erfahre optional, wenn jemand, den du als eng gelistet hast, dich ebenfalls gelistet hat ‚Äî eine sanfte Feier der Gegenseitigkeit.

dataLiberation.title: Your Data, Your Way
dataLiberation.description: Export all your data anytime. GDPR compliant with full consent management, account deletion, and data portability.

nayborNetwork.title: Naybor Network
nayborNetwork.description: Build community resilience with trusted neighbors. Quick SOS access, shared emergency contacts, and mutual aid.

globalReach.title: 23 Languages
globalReach.description: Full internationalization with RTL support for Arabic, Urdu, and Hebrew. Available in your native language.

mission.title: Echte Zeit, Keine Werbezeit
mission.description: Wir gewinnen, wenn du unsere Seite verl√§sst ‚Äî um echte Momente mit den Menschen zu teilen, die am wichtigsten sind. Wenn die Entfernung euch trennt, helfen wir dir, Videoanrufe zu starten. Aber nichts ersetzt das Dasein.
mission.inspiration: Unsere Inspiration: Dentyne Ice "Mach echte Zeit"

landing.quote: "Nicht alle Beziehungen sind symmetrisch ‚Äî und das ist v√∂llig nat√ºrlich. Das Ziel ist nicht perfekte Balance, sondern bewusste Pr√§senz."

mission.description: We win when you leave our site ‚Äî to share real moments with the people who matter most.

addLinkedFriend.privacyNote: They'll see only the contact info you used to find them until they accept. Once accepted, you'll both see each other's full contact methods.

cookies.title: We use cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to improve your experience. Essential cookies are required for the app to work.
cookies.settingsDescription: Choose which types of cookies you want to allow. Essential cookies are always enabled as they are required for the site to function.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for basic site functionality like authentication and security.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Remember your preferences like language settings and UI customizations.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors use our site to improve the experience.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to deliver relevant advertisements and track campaign effectiveness.

settings.cookieDescription: Manage which types of cookies you allow us to use.
settings.consentHistoryDescription: View and manage your consent records.
settings.noConsent: No consent record found. Please accept the cookie policy.
settings.withdrawWarning: Withdrawing consent will reset your cookie preferences and may limit some features. Are you sure?
settings.dataRightsDescription: Under GDPR, you have the right to access, export, and delete your data.
settings.exportDescription: Download all your data in a portable format
settings.deleteDescription: Permanently delete your account and all data

deletion.title: Delete Your Account
deletion.description: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data.
deletion.warningDescription: Once deleted, your account and all data will be permanently removed. Make sure to export your data first if you want to keep it.

deletedItems.connections: All your friend connections and circles
deletedItems.posts: All your posts and shared content
deletedItems.keysShared: Your Keys Shared emergency access settings

deletion.gracePeriodDescription: Your account will be scheduled for deletion in {{days}} days. You can cancel the deletion during this period by signing in.
deletion.confirmDescription: This is your final confirmation. Please verify your identity to proceed.
deletion.emailMismatch: Email does not match your account
deletion.reasonPlaceholder: Help us improve by sharing why you're leaving...
deletion.understandConsequences: I understand that my account and all data will be permanently deleted after the grace period, and this action cannot be undone.
deletion.scheduledDescription: Your account has been scheduled for deletion.
deletion.scheduledDate: Your account will be permanently deleted on:
deletion.cancelInfo: To cancel the deletion, simply sign in to your account before the scheduled date.

age.title: Age Verification
age.description: We need to verify your age to comply with privacy regulations.
age.whyDescription: Under GDPR, users under {{age}} years old require parental consent to create an account.
age.privacyNote: We only store your birth year for compliance purposes.
age.minorDescription: Users under {{age}} require parental consent. Please ask a parent or guardian to help you create an account.

registration.pageDescription: Register your emergency service organization to access Door Key Tree information during emergencies.

organization.title: Organization Info
organization.description: Tell us about your emergency service organization

legal.title: Legal Accountability
legal.description: Provide legal and insurance information for verification

contact.title: Primary Contact
contact.description: Designate a primary contact for your organization

hints.password: Use a strong password with at least 8 characters

registration.legalNotice: This information will be used for verification and legal accountability. All data is subject to audit.

terms.dataProcessing: I understand that access requests will be logged and audited.

review.verificationDescription: Your application will be reviewed by our team. You will receive an email when your account is verified or if additional information is needed.

registration.success: Application submitted successfully! You will receive an email when verified.

errors.emailExists: An account with this email already exists
errors.generic: Failed to submit application. Please try again.

login.title: Dispatch Account Login
login.subtitle: Sign in to access the Emergency Dispatch Dashboard

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

login.verificationNote: Only verified dispatch accounts can access resident information. Pending accounts have limited access.

errors.suspended: This account has been suspended. Contact support for assistance.
errors.generic: Sign in failed. Please try again.

verificationPending.title: Account Verification Pending
verificationPending.description: Your organization's application is being reviewed. You will receive an email when verified. Full access to resident search is only available after verification.

verificationRejected.title: Account Verification Rejected
verificationRejected.description: Your organization's application was not approved. Please contact support for more information.

search.title: Resident Search
search.verificationRequired: Search is only available for verified accounts

requestDialog.title: Request Door Key Tree Access
requestDialog.description: Provide emergency details and legal basis for accessing resident key holder information.
requestDialog.legalWarning: All access requests are logged and audited. Unauthorized access may result in account suspension and legal action.

errors.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
